statements: DELETE FROM Patients WHERE last_name = 'Smith' AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE last_name = 'Doe' AND age > 30
DELETE FROM lifestyles WHERE patient_id = 100 AND stress_level > 5;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age < 30 AND gender='Male';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE age > 60 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM medications WHERE patient_id = 10 AND medication_name = 'Aspirin';
DELETE FROM lifestyle WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT patient_id FROM patients WHERE age > 50);
